Reference

All functions

check_list_of_ncfiles()

Checks validity for a given list of NetCDF files

get_index_by_chunk()

Returns indices for a chunk

get_longitude_value_indices()

Returns a data.frame defining longitude value and longitude index for a given NetCDF file

map2tidy()

Extracts full time series

ncfile_to_df()

Returns a tidy data.frame from a single NetCDF file, optionally subsetting a single longitudinal band

nclist_to_df_byilon()

Returns a tidy data.frame from a list of NetCDF file(s), optionally subsetting a single a longitudinal band
